00041 Property* Repository::getRemoteProperty(CUrl url, Session* askingSession) throw ()
00042 {
00043     /*DOUT("Remotely getting property '%s' (asked by session %x, '%s')", url.c_str(), askingSession,
00044         askingSession ? askingSession->getSessionName().c_str() : "?");*/
00045     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00046     map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = remoteProperties.find(url);
00047     if (it == remoteProperties.end()) {
00048         // it is the first time someone reference this remote property
00049         DOUT("It's the first time someone refers to '%s': blind subscribing", url.c_str());
00050         Property* newProp = new Property(url, "");
00051         remoteProperties.insert(make_pair(url, newProp));
00052         RemoteSubscriptionRegister& reg = remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00053         RRemoteSubscription* sub = new RRemoteSubscription;
00054         sub->completeUrl = url;
00055         sub->askingHost = getRepositoryName();
00056         sub->socketType = Network::UDP_IP;
00057         reg.addPropertyToReceiveSubscription(askingSession, sub);
00058         propertiesMutex.unlock();
00059         return newProp;
00060     }
00061     else {
00062         propertiesMutex.unlock();
00063         // XXX forse questo �troppo lento da fare a ogni richiesta
00064         // magari �molto pi veloce mettere un bool nella Property, o un vector, o una list, o...
00065         RemoteSubscriptionRegister& reg = remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00066         vector<RRemoteSubscription> subs =
00067             reg.queryForPropertiesToReceive(url, "", Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY,
00068             RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY);
00069         if (subs.empty()) {
00070             DOUT("It's the first time someone wants to see '%s': blind subscribing", url.c_str());
00071             RemoteSubscriptionRegister& reg = remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00072             RRemoteSubscription* sub = new RRemoteSubscription;
00073             sub->completeUrl = url;
00074             sub->askingHost = getRepositoryName();
00075             sub->socketType = Network::UDP_IP;
00076             reg.addPropertyToReceiveSubscription(askingSession, sub);
00077         }
00078         else {
00079             subs = reg.queryForPropertiesToReceive(url, "", Network::TCP_IP,
00080                 RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY);
00081             if (subs.size() > 0) {
00082                 DOUT("Someone requested a TCP remote subscription for property '%s'",
00083                     url.c_str());
00084                 if (tcpManager
00085                 && tcpManager->getConnectionStatusWith(url.getHost()) != Network::CONNECTED) {
00086                     DOUT("...and there is no TCP connection with '%s', trying",
00087                         url.getHost().c_str());
00088                     tcpManager->tryConnectTo(url.getHost());
00089                 }
00090             }
00091         }
00092         return it->second;
00093     }
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Repository::sendObjectsToRemoteQueueSubscribers(CUrl completeUrl, const RDK2::Object* objToSend) throw()
00097 {
00098     RemoteSubscriptionRegister* reg = &remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00099     vector<RRemoteSubscription> psendSub = reg->queryForPropertiesToSend(completeUrl, "",
00100         Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::QUEUE, RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY);
00101     for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = psendSub.begin(); it != psendSub.end(); ++it) {
00102         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending message %s to %s",completeUrl.c_str(),it->askingHost.c_str());
00103         queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00104             new RNetMessage(it->askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00105             RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, it->socketType,
00106             new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::ENQUEUE,
00107             objToSend->clone())));
00108     }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void Repository::sendStorageValuesToRemoteValueSubscribers(CUrl completeUrl, cstr askingHost,
00112     Network::NetProtocol socketType, RRemoteSubscription::What what,
00113     RRemoteSubscription::When when) throw ()
00114 {
00115     RemoteSubscriptionRegister* reg = &remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00116     vector<RRemoteSubscription> psendSub =
00117         reg->queryForPropertiesToSend(completeUrl, askingHost, socketType, what, when);
00118     for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = psendSub.begin(); it != psendSub.end(); ++it) {
00119         Timestamp now;
00120         if ((now - it->lastSendingTimestamp).getMs() >= it->maxPeriod) {
00121             sendStorageValueToHost(it->completeUrl, it->askingHost, it->socketType);
00122             reg->refreshLastSendingTimestamp(it->id);
00123         }
00124     }
00125 }

00127 void Repository::sendStorageValueToHost(CUrl completeUrl, cstr askingHost,
00128     Network::NetProtocol socketType, RDK2::Object* objToSend)
00129     throw ()
00130 {
00131     bool alreadyunlocked = false;   // FIXME AAAAAAHHHHHHHH
00132     try {
00133         lock(completeUrl, WHERE("Sending '" + completeUrl + "' value to '" + askingHost + "'"));
00134         try {
00135             if (socketType == Network::TCP_IP) {
00136                 DOUT("Sending property '%s' via TCP", completeUrl.c_str());
00137                 if (!objToSend){ 
00138                     const RDK2::Object* objts = getObjectLC(completeUrl);
00139                     if (objts){
00140                         objToSend = objts->clone();
00141                     }
00142                     else objToSend = 0;
00143                 }
00144                 if (objToSend) {
00145                     /*RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending storage value (TCP) for property '%s' to '%s'",
00146                         completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str());*/
00147                     queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00148                         new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00149                         RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00150                         new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::VALUE,
00151                         objToSend)));
00152                 }
00153             }
00154             else if (socketType == Network::UDP_IP) {
00155                 Property* p = getProperty(completeUrl);
00156                 string objClass = p->getObjectClassName();
00157                 bool isVector = (objClass.find("Vector") != string::npos);
00158                 if (p->getObjectClassName() != "RImage" && p->getObjectClassName() != "RMapImage"
00159                 && !isVector) {
00160                     if (!objToSend) {
00161                         const RDK2::Object* sourceObj = getObjectLC(completeUrl);
00162                         if (sourceObj) objToSend = sourceObj->clone();
00163                     }
00164                     if (objToSend) {
00165                         /*RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending storage value (UDP) for property '%s' to '%s'",
00166                             completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str());*/
00167                         queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00168                             new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00169                             RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00170                             new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::VALUE,
00171                             objToSend)));
00172                         // XXX ? (avoids the burst and thus the udp buffer overflow)
00173                         //usleep(1);
00174                     }
00175                 }
00176                 else if (p->getObjectClassName() == "RImage") {
00177                     objToSend = getObjectL(completeUrl);
00178                     if (objToSend) {
00179                         int maxContentSize = 1000; // FIXME millemila
00180                         vector<ObjectDiff*> diffs = objToSend->splitInDiffs(maxContentSize);
00181                         alreadyunlocked = true;
00182                         unlock(completeUrl);
00183                         /*RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending storage value (UDP) for property '%s' "
00184                             "to '%s' split in %u diffs", completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str(),
00185                             diffs.size());*/
00186                         //int counter = 0;
00187                         int offset = rand() % diffs.size();
00188                         for (size_t i = 0; i < diffs.size(); i++) {
00189                             RImageDiffRect* imgdiffr = dynamic_cast<RImageDiffRect*>(diffs[i]);
00190                             if (imgdiffr) {
00191                                 //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("buffer size: %u", imgdiffr->getCBufSize());
00192                             }
00193                             // FIXME fare chiarezza
00194                             int a = (i+offset)%diffs.size();
00195                             
00196                             // AC: a % n  e' compreso tra 0 e n-1 se a e' positivo.
00197                             // if (a > diffs.size()-1) a = diffs.size()-1;
00198                             // else if (a < 0) a = 0;
00199                             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Il tuo dio %d", a);
00200                             a = i;
00201                             
00202                             queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00203                                 new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00204                                 RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00205                                 new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::DIFF,
00206                                 diffs[a])));
00207                                 // XXX ? (avoids burst and udp buffer overflow)
00208                                 //if ((counter++)%20==0) usleep(1);
00209                         }
00210                     }
00211                 }
00212                 else if (p->getObjectClassName() == "RMapImage") {
00213                     objToSend = getObjectL(completeUrl);
00214                     if (objToSend) {
00215                         int maxContentSize = 1000; // FIXME millemila
00216                         vector<ObjectDiff*> diffs = objToSend->splitInDiffs(maxContentSize);
00217                         alreadyunlocked = true;
00218                         unlock(completeUrl);
00219                         /*RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending storage value (UDP) for property '%s' "
00220                             "to '%s' split in %u diffs", completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str(),
00221                             diffs.size());*/
00222                         //int counter = 0;
00223                         for (size_t i = 0; i < diffs.size(); i++) {
00224                             RMapImageDiffRect* imgdiffr = dynamic_cast<RMapImageDiffRect*>(diffs[i]);
00225                             if (imgdiffr) {
00226                                 /*RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Diff %d; buffer size: %u",
00227                                     i, imgdiffr->imageDiffRect->getCBufSize());*/
00228                             }
00229                             queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00230                                 new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00231                                 RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00232                                 new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::DIFF,
00233                                 diffs[i])));
00234                                 // XXX ? (avoids burst and udp buffer overflow)
00235                                 //if ((counter++)%20==0) usleep(1);
00236                         }
00237                     }
00238                 }
00239                 else if (isVector) {
00240                     objToSend = getObjectL(completeUrl);
00241                     if (objToSend) {
00242                         int maxContentSize = 1000; // FIXME millemila
00243                         vector<ObjectDiff*> diffs = objToSend->splitInDiffs(maxContentSize);
00244                         alreadyunlocked = true;
00245                         unlock(completeUrl);
00246                         /*RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending storage value (UDP) for property '%s' "
00247                             "to '%s' split in %u diffs", completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str(),
00248                             diffs.size());*/
00249                         //int counter = 0;
00250                         for (size_t i = 0; i < diffs.size(); i++) {
00251                             queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00252                                 new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00253                                 RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00254                                 new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::DIFF,
00255                                 diffs[i])));
00256                                 // XXX ? (avoids burst and udp buffer overflow)
00257                                 //if ((counter++)%20==0) usleep(1);
00258                         }
00259                     }
00260                 }
00261             }
00262             else {
00263                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("You should decide how to send this stuff!");
00264             }
00265         }
00266         catch (const SessionException& e) {
00267             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00268         }
00269         if (!alreadyunlocked) unlock(completeUrl);
00270     }
00271     catch (const SessionException& e) {
00272         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00273     }
00274 }

00276 void Repository::sendStorageDiffToHost(CUrl completeUrl, cstr askingHost, Network::NetProtocol socketType,
00277     ObjectDiff* diffToSend) throw ()
00278 {
00279     if (!diffToSend) {
00280         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Trying to send a null diff");
00281         return;
00282     }
00283     try {
00284         lock(completeUrl, HERE);
00285         try {
00286             if (socketType == Network::TCP_IP) {
00287                 DOUT("Sending storage diff (TCP) for property '%s' to '%s'",
00288                     completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str());
00289                 queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00290                     new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00291                     RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00292                     new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::DIFF,
00293                     diffToSend)));
00294             }
00295             else if (socketType == Network::UDP_IP) {
00296                 DOUT("Sending storage diff (UDP) for property '%s' to '%s'",
00297                     completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str());
00298                 int maxContentSize = 1000; // FIXME millemila
00299                 vector<ObjectDiff*> diffs = diffToSend->split(maxContentSize);
00300                 DOUT("Split diff in %u diffs", diffs.size());
00301                 for (size_t i = 0; i < diffs.size(); i++) {
00302                     RImageDiffRect* imgdiffr = dynamic_cast<RImageDiffRect*>(diffs[i]);
00303                     if (imgdiffr) {
00304                         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("buffer size: %u", imgdiffr->getCBufSize());
00305                     }
00306                     queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00307                         new RNetMessage(askingHost, getRepositoryName(),
00308                         RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE, socketType,
00309                         new RPropertyUpdate(completeUrl, RPropertyUpdate::DIFF,
00310                         diffs[i])));
00311                 }
00312                 delete diffToSend;
00313             }
00314             else {
00315                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("You should decide how to send this stuff!");
00316             }
00317         }
00318         catch (const SessionException& e) {
00319             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00320         }
00321         unlock(completeUrl);
00322     }
00323     catch (const SessionException& e) {
00324         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00325     }
00326 }
00327 
00328 void Repository::remotePropertyOptions(CUrl url, Network::NetProtocol socketType,
00329     RRemoteSubscription::What what, RRemoteSubscription::When when, double minPeriod, double maxPeriod)
00330     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00331 {
00332     if (isLocalProperty(url)) return;
00333 
00334     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00335     map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = remoteProperties.find(url);
00336     if (it == remoteProperties.end()) {
00337         remoteProperties.insert(make_pair(url, new Property(url, "")));
00338     }
00339     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00340 
00341     RemoteSubscriptionRegister& reg = remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00342     RRemoteSubscription* sub = new RRemoteSubscription;
00343     sub->completeUrl = url;
00344     sub->askingHost = getRepositoryName();
00345     sub->what = what;
00346     sub->when = when;
00347     sub->socketType = socketType;
00348     sub->minPeriod = maxPeriod;
00349     sub->maxPeriod = maxPeriod;
00350     reg.addPropertyToReceiveSubscription(0, sub);
00351 }
00352 
00353 void Repository::setRemotePropertyDef(CUrl url, const RPropertyDef* def)
00354 {
00355     if (isLocalProperty(url)) return;
00356 
00357     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00358     map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = remoteProperties.find(url);
00359     if (it == remoteProperties.end()) {
00360         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Adding remote def property for '%s' (class %s)",
00361             url.c_str(), def->getObjectClassName().c_str());
00362         remoteProperties.insert(make_pair(url, new Property(*def)));
00363     }
00364     else {
00365         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Setting remote daf property for '%s' (class %s)",
00366             url.c_str(), def->getObjectClassName().c_str());
00367         Property* p = it->second;
00368         p->lock(HERE);
00369         if (p->getObjectClassName() == "") p->setObjectClassName(def->getObjectClassName());
00370         // FIXME anche gli altri membri di property
00371         p->unlock();
00372     }
00373     // FIXME fare un posto comune per questo (vedi repository.cpp)
00374     for (multimap<string, Session*>::iterator it = sessionsListeningToTree.begin();
00375     it != sessionsListeningToTree.end(); ++it) {
00376         if (url.startsWith(it->first)) {
00377             it->second->pushEvent(new EventPropertyTreeAdded(url));
00378         }
00379     }
00380     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00381 }
00382 
00383 // propriet�locali storage
00384 //   quando viene aggiornata
00385 //     per ogni host che ha sottoscritto la propriet�FULL + WHEN_CHANGES, invia oggetto
00386 //     per ogni host che ha sottoscritto la propriet�UPDATES + SINGLE, invia aggiornamento
00387 //   quando viene letta
00388 //     se non �ancora stata sottoscritta, sottoscriverla con opzioni di default
00389 
00390 // propriet�locali queue
00391 //   quando viene aggiornata
00392 //     per ogni host che ha sottoscritto la propriet�HISTORY, invia gli oggetti non ancora inviati
00393 //     per ogni host che ha sottoscritto la propriet�LAST, invia l'ultimo oggetto
00394 //   quando viene letta
00395 //     se non �stata ancora sottoscritta, sottoscriverla con opzioni di default
00396 
00397 // propriet�remote
00398 //   quando viene aggiornata
00399 //     inviare l'aggiornamento all'host remoto
00400 //   quando viene letta
00401 //     se non �ancora stata sottoscritta, sottoscriverla con opzioni di default
00402 //     prendere la copia locale
00403 
00404 // thread periodico
00405 //   per ogni propriet�che �stata sottoscritta FULL + PERIODIC, invia l'oggetto (secondo period)
00406 //   per ogni propriet�che �stata sottoscritta UPDATES + PACK, invia gli aggiornamenti (comprimendoli e secondo maxWaitPeriod)
00407 
00408 // ("inviare" = mettere nella outbox)
